alert.note: Alert for Butte; Harding; Northern Foothills; Northern Meade Co Plains; Northern Perkins; Southern Perkins; Ziebach (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 18 at 1:26PM MST until January 19 at 8:00AM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Blowing snow and dangerously cold wind chills. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Portions of northwestern South Dakota and northeast Wyoming. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Cheyenne River Reservation. * WHEN...Until 8 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. The dangerously cold wind chills as low as 35 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling, especially in open areas. Road conditions are available on your smartphone from the 5 1 1 app for your state.

area.areaDesc: Butte; Harding; Northern Foothills; Northern Meade Co Plains; Northern Perkins; Southern Perkins; Ziebach
